title: Secret Santa
body:
Riot, I would love it if you would organise a sort of Secret Santa for our community:) 

**Requirements: **
- Minimum and maximum spending limit: Suggesting $5.00/$20.00 respectively
- A way so people can't just say they're participating and then not participate (Prepaid)
- Including the already existing $5.00 mystery gift you can buy, include a $10.00 and $20.00 mystery box? This could include multiple skins etc.
- A dead line for the Secret Santa to be paid by
- Make it so your Secret Santa pays the same amount for your gift as you did yours, easily done with the 3 mystery boxes.

Vote down below and up vote this post if you think this is a good idea:)
